貌似.definition: to appear to be; to seem as if

貌合心離.definition: the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement

貌合神離.definition: the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement

貌相.definition: appearance (esp. superficial); looks; to judge a person by appearances

貌美如花.definition: (of a woman) lovely as a flower (idiom); beautiful

貌若潘安.definition: to have the looks of a Pan An 潘安[Pan1 An1] (referring to a historical figure said to be extremely handsome)
